reviewText: I would recommend this 2 cd set to any TINA fan..it has the best concert I have ever seen of her and the sax player is very sexy too, and can really play the sax.Tina made a big comeback many yrs. ago now, and I am very happy she did, I always believed in her and after readingher book, I, Tina I got a whole new perspective on her life and her singing.She blows you away with every song on this double set, but I love GOLDENEYE done for the James Bond movie the best!!There is no one like Tina and I fantasize someday of a concert of TINA AND CHER, now that would be amazing!ROCK ON TINA FOREVER!All Tina fans should have this video collection...I waited till this came out as a double concert cd, but still love the single concerts too..all of them..BUY IT, you will see a fantastic concert collection..

reviewText: 2 great shows but they are technically dated. They may look good on a 26" tv but on a big screen they are pretty poor.Also  I didn't care for the editing, seems like the editor/director were on meth, incessantly fast cutting. I will wait for a hopeful remastering for bluray, although I'm sure it won't be re-edited. For dedicated fans only, or casual fans with small screens.
Title: N/A

reviewText: What can I say about this DVD except that it is amazing from start to finish. Tina is like a fine wine - she gets better with age and man is she good in this concert.If you're a Tina Turner fan, you must get this DVD set. I was on my feet the entire time dancing, singing, screaming, clapping, laughing...just having a blast!THIS IS TINA TURNER AT HER BEST! That unique unfailing voice, the hair, the mouth, the legs, the signature moves, THE ENERGY! Wow!. She is gooood! And how old was she when she did this concert tour? 57? I wanna be her when I grow up. She's my favorite singer and one of my favorite human beings. I love Pink too, but Tina is number 1.The band is on fire. The dancers are amazing. The fans are as Tina says, "wonderful."You will not be disappointed. This DVD is going in my safety deposit box. LOL! It's just THAT GOOD!I love you, Tina!!!
summary: Tina Turner is Simply The Best, and so is this DVD.

reviewText: The title of my review says it all. I am watching Amsterdam as I write this. It is a high energy sexy spectacle. Tina is simply amazing as a singer performer and entertainer. The band, recoding, both audio and video are absolutely first rate as well. The only thing lacking here is blu Ray! Deserves 6 stars!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Both of these concerts serve as amazing recent chapters in the long, impressive performance history of Tina Turner. The voice, the legs and the energy have not yet seemed to wither!  The Amsterdam concert is a little more slickly edited in that "music video style," but the songs are great!  Tina really rocks (most notably during her heavy metal version of "I Heard It Through the Grapevine," and the climactic "Nutbush City Limits.") The second great concert at Wembley seems more fashioned as a theatrical performance - with Tina taking a seat onstage for the first time that I can remember!  She sizzles during her seated low-key version of "Steamy Windows," but also cranks it up for the famous "Proud Mary" hair flip dance number! This is a great opportunity to have both of these great concerts TOGETHER!  Now how about releasing a COMPLETE Tina Turner music video (video, not live performance) anthology on DVD???  Like the song says, Tina is simply "The Best!"
Title: N/A

reviewText: You just gotta LOVE Tina!  Watching her on stage or listening to her CD's will make you smile, BUY THIS DVD!!!!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: In an age of Lady Gaga, Beyonce, Taylor Swift, Nicki Minaj and countless others who make claims about being artists and being consummate performers, it's great to see a real legend and artist showing us the true meaning of such claims.  Tina Turner never had to make such pronouncements.  She proved it with every performance and with every memorable song.  They are unforgettable.  I never had the pleasure/honor to see Ms. Turner live in performance because I was too young and surely couldn't afford it but boy oh boy am I so thrilled to know that there is a real record of her wonderfully feminine performances...sex appeal and I mean real sex appeal -not vulgarity- stamina, grace and hello, did I mention she's NEVER OFF PITCH!!  She gets it right all the time.  Consider that these performances are already almost 20 years old and the technology for on site vocal engineering was not in place.  Tina Turner gives you all she's got and you never get the feeling she's completely spent when she's done.
Title: N/A
